Text:
If you do not know how to do bit torrent file sharing, you really ought to learn first, before creating torrent postings on TPB.

Also, naming a torrent posting "T: Torrent name: (if other than file name) " has to be the dumbest title ever seen on TPB.

Our tutorials for how to do torrenting are found here:  https://forum.suprbay.org/forumdisplay.php?fid=43
